FuncDef:
The cmp request server url command configures a URL for a CMPv2 server.
The undo cmp request server url command cancels the configuration.
By default, no URL is configured for a CMPv2 server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the URL of a CMPv2 server.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-insensitive characters.

Specifies the VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When applying for a certificate, you need to specify a URL for a CMPv2 server.
Configuration Impact
After you run the cmp request server url command on a device, the device sends requests to a CMPv2 server based on the configured URL.
